seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Software & Data Engineer' without 'Senior', but requires 1-5 years software development + 1+ years data engineering experience, which aligns with mid-level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Software & Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, workflows, data integrations, and data management within Palantir Foundry

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on Palantir Foundry platform with data pipelines and workflows, plus manufacturing/industrial systems as nice-to-have, indicating general data engineering with some domain specialization

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, mentoring, or team leadership; role focuses on collaboration with Product Owner and other engineers on implementation tasks

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned; Palantir Foundry is a platform but cloud provider not specified

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned beyond Palantir Foundry platform

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions data pipelines and workflows but no specific streaming (Kafka) or batch (Airflow) technologies to determine processing type

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned; Palantir Foundry may have internal orchestration but not specified

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies mentioned; Palantir Foundry manages data but storage specifics not detailed

remote_restriction.evidence: Work model stated as 'onsite' with specific location 'Berthoud, CO', requiring presence in that geographic region

timezone_focus.evidence: US citizenship/permanent residency required with onsite location in Berthoud, CO, indicating US-based role with Mountain Time Zone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in Berthoud, CO with no relocation package mentioned, implying candidates not already in the area would need to relocate

h1b_friendly.evidence: Explicitly requires 'US Citizenship or Permanent Residency', which excludes H1B visa sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: US citizenship or permanent residency requirement excludes student visa holders on OPT/CPT

citizenship_required.evidence: States 'US Citizenship or Permanent Residency' requirement, indicating US citizen or green card holder status needed

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Classification as 'Full-time Exempt' with comprehensive benefits package and 'permanent' contract type indicates W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including unlimited PTO, equity grants, comprehensive health insurance, 401k matching, and additional voluntary benefits

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions that work will 'directly shape how Ursa Major continues its growth' but no specific career progression paths or advancement opportunities detailed

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with Product Owner and other engineers but no specific mentorship program or learning from senior staff mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Required Qualifications' (must-have) and 'Desired Experience' (nice-to-have), with balanced but not overly strict requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically on Software & Data Engineer role within Palantir Foundry, with well-defined responsibilities and clear scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 1-5 years software development + 1+ years data engineering experience is reasonable for mid-level role; skills listed are appropriate and not inflated
